name: Trundle
title: the Troll King
lore: Trundle is a hulking and devious troll with a particularly vicious streak, and there is nothing he cannot bludgeon into submission—not even the Freljord itself. Fiercely territorial, he chases down anyone foolish enough to enter his domain. Then, his massive club of True Ice at the ready, he chills his enemies to the bone and impales them with jagged, frozen pillars, laughing as they bleed out onto the tundra.
blurb: Trundle is a hulking and devious troll with a particularly vicious streak, and there is nothing he cannot bludgeon into submission—not even the Freljord itself. Fiercely territorial, he chases down anyone foolish enough to enter his domain. Then, his...
allytips: Trundle excels at fighting within his Frozen Domain. Try to draw enemies onto it.
Use Subjugate to soften a powerful enemy tank or to create a target for your team to focus fire.
Chomp is good for lowering the physical damage of enemies; try to focus it on enemy physical damage dealers.
enemytips: Trundle is very powerful at location-based combat. Try to draw him off of his Frozen Domain.
Make sure to get out of his Pillar of Ice as quickly as possible, as it significantly slows you down.

riot_spell_q.name: Chomp
riot_spell_q.description: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.

This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by {{ e3 }} for {{ e6 }} seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.

riot_spell_w.name: Frozen Domain
riot_spell_w.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.

riot_spell_e.name: Pillar of Ice
riot_spell_e.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

riot_spell_r.name: Subjugate
riot_spell_r.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
riot_spell_r.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ totalpercenthpdamage }} of an enemy champion's maximum Health as Magic Damage and {{ armormrshred*100 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ actualdurationofdrainbuff }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ durationofdrainfortooltip }} seconds after the drain ends.

riot_spell_i.name: King's Tribute
riot_spell_i.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

wikia_skill_i1.name: King's Tribute
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he {{tip|heal|heals}} for a percent of its maximum Health.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Whenever an enemy dies near '''Trundle''', he {{tip|heal|heals}} for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|5|key=%|2 to 6|1;5;9;12;15}} of their '''maximum''' health}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* [[Monster|Neutral monster]] deaths will trigger ''King's Tribute'', even if their killer was an enemy.
* ''King's Tribute'' does not trigger when an enemy structure is destroyed.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Chomp
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} his target by 75% for {{fd|0.1}} seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: After biting his target, '''Trundle''' gains {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}} for 5 seconds and reduces his target's {{as|attack damage}} by half that amount for the same duration.
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** As with most on-hit physical damage, the bonus damage from ''Chomp'' will apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} will not interact with the bonus damage from ''Chomp''.
** The bonus damage '''will''' affect [[turret]]s.
** ''Chomp's''  will still incur the attack damage increase/decrease if Trundle's attack is {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}} or if ''Trundle'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Frozen Domain
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' coats the target area in ice for 8 seconds. While inside, he gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, and 25% increased [[healing|health restoration]] from all sources.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|30 to 100}}%}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20 to 40}}%}}
wikia_skill_w1.notes: *''Frozen Domain'' has no cast time and does not interrupt Trundle's previous orders.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Pillar of Ice
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Trundle''' projects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds, {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} everyone directly over it 225 units on cast, acting as impassable terrain for the duration and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies around it.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* ''Pillar of Ice'' can knock back allied units.
* ''Pillar of Ice'' cannot be placed inside impassable terrain. Attempting to do so will cause the pillar to spawn in the nearest available spot of accessible terrain, similar to {{ii|Warding Totem|wards}} and traps such as {{cai|Yordle Snap Trap|Caitlyn}}.
* ''Pillar Of Ice'' triggers in-combat effects such as drawing turret aggro, applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}} and {{ri|Sudden Impact}}.
* ''Pillar of Ice'' is able to interrupt both ally and enemy {{si|Recall}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Subjugate
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{fd|0.5}} seconds, '''Trundle''' starts draining the life force out of the target enemy [[champion]], {{tip|heal|healing}} for a percentage of {{as|the target's '''maximum''' health}}, dealing the same amount as {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and stealing {{sti|armor|{{as|40% of their armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resistance}}}}. Half of the total [[damage]] and stealing is applied instantly, and the other half is applied over the next 4 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling: {{st|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|20 to 35}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}|Initial Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|20/2 to 35/2}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}|Magic Damage Per Second|{{as|{{ap|20/8 to 35/8}}% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health|health}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.description2: The armor and magic resist will remain stolen for 4 seconds after the drain has ended.
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * The total value of armor, magic resist and damage that will be dealt is determined ''at the point of cast''. Temporary boosts/reductions in resistances or health will affect those values if they are active before cast, but will not affect those values if they come into effect afterwards.
